Development

jmapc
  • Methods API
  • View page source

Methods API

JMAP methods are the core operations you can perform. jmapc provides typed method classes for all supported JMAP operations.

class jmapc.methods.CoreEcho(data: 'Optional[dict[str, Any]]' = None)[source]
